inclusion.criterion: Presence of at least moderate chronic OMR defined as an ERO ≥20mm2 and/or a regurgitant volume ≥30mL
inclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: MR due to ischemic heart disease or cardiomyopathy
exclusion.label: triggers

exclusion.criterion: history of myocardial infarction or angiographycally documented coronary stenosis
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: Patient has Marfan's syndrome and severe mitral valve prolapse with regurgitation, which may be a contraindication for surgery. However, the patient is now prepared to undergo mitral valve repair/replacement surgery.
